column1: #Bowser's Empire, of course! (Will be De Jure Darkland, and require certain special prerequisites to be decided on)
#SMB3 Kingdoms. Maybe a placeholder. Named after the Engrish word for World, "Warudo", because the Japanese names all have "Warudo" preceeding them.
#Kongo Bongo and Kremland. Named after the Rare Sea, which in the mod is the location of Kongo Bongo (Shout out to Avro for that magnificent decision)
#Probably gonna be Titular, since the lands that'd comprise it are kinda far between, but if De Jure would be Kitchen Island, Marioland, South Sprixie Islands, and Diamond Shogunate
#Titular Empires. Cultures without Empires + Plot-important Empires go here.
#Diamond City Empire, requires either Diamond/Ouji culture and/or Formist religion and to own the Diamond Kingdom
#Pirate culture/religion titular Empire. Named after Pirate Land from Mario Party.
